NOTE: the Hidden One has no Autobot insignia, and has no 
Autobot signal. It is designed for stealth, and won't be recognizable 
by scanners until it crashes on the planet, and much of it breaks 
down. DED know that the ship is Autobot, because they were 
spying. =)

OOC: Gunthers, are any of your DED guys outside of the ship? 

--- Pacifix / Crossroads / Soundwave ---

Pacifix nods, and recovers his posture, "Well." He looks at the 
space mortars, "I don't think that we'll have to use those. Come." 
He starts to head to the command center. When he arrives there, 
the scanners bleep once, and the computer starts to say, 
"Disturbance detec--" but it is cut off as the ship powers down, and 
all power is lost, including auxilary power sources. Pacifix sits 
down.

Crossroads also starts out of the room, when the ship powers 
down, and the lights turn out. He frowns, and mumbles to himself, 
"Damn, this is wierd..." He heads into the first room he can see, 
but finds that the door won't open. 

On the DED ship,

Soundwave frowns at this unknown weakness that has struck him. 
"He watches the scanners, and frowns even more, "Surge 
detected," Suddenly, the power fails.

OOC: gtg, add more on later. =P


On 28 Jun 2001, at 6:06, gunthers8@... wrote:

> Crotale looks at Pacifix as he huggs him.  "Get off me... save your
> energy.  If you haven't noticed there something is not right.  Now as
> commander you must fix it.  Now, what do you wish me to do Pacifix."
> He said holding two large space  mortars in his hand.
> 
> JetV ran back to the storage bay.  "All right everyone.  I need you to
> all take defensive positions.  Technobots, you handle outer weapons.
> You Dion, and...ummm Repugnus, cover the starboard portal.  Dinobots,
> Grimlock, by PAcifix command you must be ready to go into space to
> fight." he winced afraid of the reaction. "And finally Crossroads,
> find to others to cover the port airlocks to the outers. Everyone
> understand?"
> 
> "Artemis, you stay with me, we will moniter" he said quietly to 
> ARtemis.
> 
> Repugnus stood, taking his orders began to walk to the starboard
> entrance. "Lets do this Dion."
> 
> Slag looked to Grimlock. "We take orders Grimlock?" he said.
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> > ::Dion::
> >

> to
